title: CJI suggestion in stark contradiction to his own actions
selftext: Current CJI seems most willing to compromise than anyone in Supreme Court’s history but that doesn’t stop him from dishing out this nonsense to others.
comments:
Our courts have become a joke. Thanks to nepotism and casteism. Which has ensured that any person with a spine or and shred of decency is sidelined and dismissed. 

The result is a Supreme Court which makes judgements based on politics and convenience over right and wrong.
